Delivery

Class RefrigeratedTruck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Delivery.Truck
      • Delivery.RefrigeratedTruck

  • public class RefrigeratedTruck
extends Truck
    Creates an truck that is temperature controlled Extends the abstract Truck class
    Author:
    Greyden Scott

      • RefrigeratedTruck

        public RefrigeratedTruck(Stock cargo)

    • Method Detail

      • getTemperature

        public int getTemperature()
        Returns the trucks set temperature.
        Returns:
        temperature

      • setTemperature

        public void setTemperature()
        Sets the trucks temperature based on the inventory. Checks to see which item requires the lowest temp and sets the temperature as that value.

      • getCapacity

        public int getCapacity()
        Returns the trucks maximum item capacity.
        Specified by:
        getCapacity in class Truck
        Returns:
        Cargo capacity of 800 items.

      • getCost

        public double getCost()
        Returns the operating cost of the truck.
        Specified by:
        getCost in class Truck
        Returns:
        Cost in dollars equal to 900 + 200 × 0.7T/5 where T is the truck’s temperature in °C.

      • getCargo

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getCargo()
                                          throws StockException
        Temperature in °C that maintains a safe temperature for the truck’s cargo. This is equal to the temperature of the item in the cargo with the coldest safe temperature. The allowed temperature range is from -20°C inclusive to 10°C inclusive.
        Specified by:
        getCargo in class Truck
        Returns:
        returns a List of constructed strings to be processed into a manifest file. The strings are the item names and quantity to be reordered.
        Throws:
        StockException
